description: Perodua supplies only the best quality vehicles and this car is yet another example from their impressive fleet. This Perodua Viva viva elite  2011  comes with a Automatic transmission system as well as other great features. With 72000km on the clock, this car is exceptional value at Rs.2160000. Please mention Carmudi when you contact the seller!
name: Perodua Viva 2011
